history.proof: intros. destruct H0 as [H0a [H0b H0c]]. qsimpl. apply pow_N. - apply pow_N. + qauto use: divides_anti, divides_mult_r, Nat.mul_comm, divides_refl. + sfirstorder depth: 3. + qauto use: divides_anti, divides_mult_r, Nat.mul_comm, divides_refl. + sfirstorder depth: 3. - intros. sfirstorder depth: 3. - qauto use: divides_anti, divides_mult_r, Nat.mul_comm, divides_refl. - sfirstorder depth: 3.

exceptions.tactic: intros r2 r1 q p H1 H2.
intros r2' r1 q p H1 H2.
intros r2' r1' q p H1 H2.
intros r2' r1' q' p H1 H2.
intros r2' r1' q' p' H1 H2.

The reference H2 was not found in the current environment.
In environment p, q, r1, r2 : nat H : is_gcd p q r1 H0a : r2 div p H0b : r2 div q H0c : forall k : nat, k div p -> k div q -> k div r2 Unable to unify "?M1444 = ?M1445" with "r1 = r2".

In environment r1, r2, x, x0 : nat H0c : forall k : nat, k div x0 * r2 -> k div x * r2 -> k div r2 H2 : forall k : nat, k div x0 * r2 -> k div x * r2 -> k div r1 x1 : nat H1 : x * r2 = x1 * r1 x2 : nat H : x0 * r2 = x2 * r1 Unable to unify "r2" with "r1".

original: intros r2 r1 q p H1 H2. destruct H1 as [H1a [H1b H1c]]. destruct H2 as [H2a [H2b H2c]]. apply (Eqdep_dec.UIP_dec Nat.eq_dec). split; [split|]. - apply H1a. - apply H2a. - intros k Hk1 Hk2. apply (div_antisym _ _ _ H1c H2c Hk1 Hk2).
